coded_answer.p: I recivedreceived your letter about the I won two weekstwo weeks I won at camp California in the U.S.A.
I would like travelto travel in July because I will have holidays in thisthat mounthmonth.
About the accommodation at camp, I prefer ina tentstent because I love sleepto sleep in tents,. It is more interesting than sleepsleeping in log cabins.
I would like doto do climbing and sailing while I'm at the camp,. I can climbingclimb very well. I used to climbingclimb ten years ago in my country.

I'm worried about what kind of clothes I will need in the camp? andAnd how much money I have to carrybring for the trip? Could you answer my questions please as soon as you can, because I'm nervous, and I need your soon answeranswer soon, and I will have a talk with my parents about the camp.

I agree withthat shopping is not always enjoyable. Nowadays, the people are always buying anythingsanythingthings when maybe they don't need thisthese things, but only buy them because they isare in fashion.
